errors.error_description: Added invalid --install-option parameter to pip install command
Suggested installing faiss via pip before setting up conda, which is incorrect order
correction_candidates: To use the testing module, you'll need faiss, which can be installed via conda as well. See the [installation instructions for faiss](https://github.com/facebookresearch/faiss/blob/master/INSTALL.md).

To use the testing module, you'll need faiss, which should be installed after conda setup. See the [installation instructions for faiss](https://github.com/facebookresearch/faiss/blob/master/INSTALL.md).

To use the testing module, you'll need faiss, which can be installed using conda install faiss-cpu. See the [installation instructions for faiss](https://github.com/facebookresearch/faiss/blob/master/INSTALL.md).
To use the testing module, you'll need faiss, which must be compiled from source. See the [installation instructions for faiss](https://github.com/facebookresearch/faiss/blob/master/INSTALL.md).
errors.golden_answer: To use the testing module, you'll need faiss, which can be installed via conda as well. See the [installation instructions for faiss](https://github.com/facebookresearch/faiss/blob/master/INSTALL.md).
